title: Cultural Night
description: A celebration of diverse traditions with performances, food stalls, and ethnic fashion.

title: TechFest Expo
description: A showcase of student innovations, coding contests, and emerging tech demos.

title: Debate Championship
description: Inter-departmental debate competition featuring top student orators.

title: Sports Day
description: A full day of athletic competitions, games, and fun relays.

title: Film Screening & Discussion
description: A socially relevant film screening followed by an expert-led panel discussion.

title: Art & Photography Exhibition
description: Students display their best artwork and photo projects in a curated gallery setup.

title: Hackathon 24x
description: A 24-hour coding and problem-solving competition open to all departments.

title: Literary Fest
description: A celebration of diverse traditions with performances, food stalls, and ethnic fashion.

title: Career Fair
description: Companies visit the campus for recruitment and internship opportunities

title: Music Jam Night
description: Bands and solo artists from campus perform in an open-air evening concert.

title: Mental Health Awareness Day
description: Workshops, counselling booths, and guest talks to promote student well-being.

title: Alumni Meet
description: Former students return to share experiences and network with current students.

title: Research Symposium
description: Students present their academic projects and research papers.

title: Game Fest
description: Board games, esports, and VR game tournaments.

title: Food Carnival
description: Food trucks and student-run stalls offer a global menu of dishes.
